definition: bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate

sentences.english: Let’s discuss some of the best ways to find online coupons.
sentences.chinese: 先民，就让我们来讨论一些淘到网络优惠券的好方法。

sentences.english: You can set a 10 percent discount with it.
sentences.chinese: 这是优惠券，用它你可以打九折。

sentences.english: Tear off this coupon and use it to get RMB5 off your next book.
sentences.chinese: 撕下这张优惠券，你下次再买书时就可以省5块钱。

sentences.english: Do you have couple code or any cheap price?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我优惠券代码，或者优惠价格吗？

sentences.english: They present coupons and coupon to help you save money.
sentences.chinese: 他们提供了优惠券或者优惠活动来帮你省钱。

sentences.english: I won’t get into what happens if I have coupons.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有优惠券，我不会陷入所发生的事中。

sentences.english: Her bag is stuffed with McDonald's coupons and other discount cards.
sentences.chinese: 她的手包里有麦当劳的优惠券和其他各种打折卡。

sentences.english: If you plan to buy baby food, use coupons to lower the cost.
sentences.chinese: 如果你计划购买婴儿食品，请使用优惠券来降低费用。

sentences.english: This offer is not applicable to the ticket stub of complimentary ticket.
sentences.chinese: 此优惠券不适用于赠券之票尾。

sentences.english: Demand for the vouchers could soar over the next few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 不过在未来数周，这种优惠券的市场需求可能飙升。

sentences.english: Torsten begins by asking Cindy, "What are you doing, clipping coupons?"
sentences.chinese: 托斯特一开始问辛迪，“你在干什么，剪优惠券吗？”

sentences.english: Shopping vouchers are often a gook means of attracting customers.
sentences.chinese: 购物优惠券是吸引顾客的好方法。

sentences.english: You can collect points from the soda bottles and use them to get discount coupons.
sentences.chinese: 你可以从汽水瓶上收集点数，然后去兑换打折优惠券。

sentences.english: Since we download the coupons from the website, we have braised pork in brown sauce in free.
sentences.chinese: 因为从网上打了优惠券，所以，红烧肉是免费赠送的。

sentences.english: They may offer printable coupons for your desired product.
sentences.chinese: 他们或许提供你所想购买商品的纸质优惠券。

sentences.english: Admin Can Give a Coupon Code for any Spacial event or offer.
sentences.chinese: 管理员可以给任何空间活动或提供优惠券代码。

definition: bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate
to exchange for (sth of equal value or utility)/to use in lieu/to redeem (a coupon etc)/to use to offset (an amount owed etc)
group buying/collective buying/buying by a group of individuals who negotiate a discount for the group
buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
abbr. for 特別優惠|特别优惠[te4 bie2 you1 hui4]/ex gratia
